name: Space Run (itch) (BD Games)
description:
If you like high speed space racing game featuring advanced space fighter craft, or if you like to experience adrenaline-pumping race track 

that have dangerous obstacles and traps, then Space Run! will definitely be your choice. The game test your reflex by introducing you a very 

exciting 3D racing environment, where high score is not only achieved by how long you can survive in the race, but also by how many bonus 

sphere you can collect along the way. Use your skills to challenge your limit. Come and create new record!
